sentences.en: ‘How are you?’ ‘Fine, thanks, how are you?’
sentences.cn: “你好吗？”“很好，谢谢，你呢？”

sentences.en: ‘How’s it going?’ ‘Fine, thanks.’
sentences.cn: “你好吗？”“很好，谢谢。”

sentences.en: "I want to send a telegram." — "Fine, to whom?"
sentences.cn: “我想发份电报。”——“好的，发给谁？”

sentences.en: "Is Mary Ann O.K?" — "She's fine," she said evenly.
sentences.cn: “玛丽·安还好么？”——“她很好，”她平静地说。

sentences.en: a £40 fine
sentences.cn: 40英镑罚款

sentences.en: an omelette will do fine.
sentences.cn: 一份煎蛋就行了。

sentences.en: Before the race, he is fine. But afterwards he is worn out.
sentences.cn: 赛前他状态很好，赛后就筋疲力尽了。

sentences.en: Billy Sullivan had impressed me as a fine man.
sentences.cn: 比利·沙利文给我留下的印象是他是个很不错的人。

sentences.en: Both mother and daughter, who have requested anonymity, are doing fine.
sentences.cn: 这对不愿意透露姓名的母女俩目前情况良好。

sentences.en: boys who have cut it rather fine are scuttling into chapel.
sentences.cn: 时间掐得太紧的男生们正匆匆赶进小礼拜堂。

sentences.en: By all accounts, Rodger would appear to be a fine fellow.
sentences.cn: 据说，罗杰是个好小伙。

sentences.en: Councils will get sweeping powers to impose fines on drivers who park illegally.
sentences.cn: 各市政会将有绝对权力对违章停车者处以罚款。

sentences.en: fine blond hair
sentences.cn: 纤细的金发

sentences.en: fine clothes/wines/workmanship
sentences.cn: 漂亮的衣服；美酒；精湛的工艺

sentences.en: Hatfield House is a fine example of Jacobean architecture.
sentences.cn: 哈特菲尔德宅第是英王詹姆斯一世时期建筑的典范。

sentences.en: He is likely to get off with a small fine.
sentences.cn: 他可能会逃脱严惩，仅仅罚一点钱了事。

sentences.en: He was about seven years old, small and fine-boned like his mother.
sentences.cn: 他大概7岁，骨架像他妈妈一样娇小均匀。

sentences.en: he went on to discuss the finer points of his work.
sentences.cn: 他接着谈起了他工作中的细节。

sentences.en: He’s a very fine player.
sentences.cn: 他是个很优秀的选手。

sentences.en: His canoes are known for their style, fine detail and craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 他的独木舟以其风格独特、注重细节和做工精细著称。

sentences.en: I am partial to desserts that combine fresh fruit with fine pastry.
sentences.cn: 我偏爱加有新鲜水果的精致油酥甜点。

sentences.en: I feel fine , really.
sentences.cn: 我感觉很好，真的。

sentences.en: If I had a good job and my boyfriend stayed at home, that’d suit me fine (= be very acceptable to me ) .
sentences.cn: 要是我有一份好工作，而我男朋友待在家里，我完全能够接受。

sentences.en: If it’s fine tomorrow we’ll go out.
sentences.cn: 如果明天天气晴朗，我们就出门。

sentences.en: In the end, it was an easy delivery: a fine baby boy.
sentences.cn: 分娩过程最终非常顺利，生了个健康的男婴。

sentences.en: It’s a fine idea.
sentences.cn: 这是个很妙的主意。

sentences.en: Many people regard Beethoven’s fifth symphony as his finest work.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为贝多芬的第五交响曲是他最杰出的作品。

sentences.en: Moscow's finest.
sentences.cn: 莫斯科警方。

sentences.en: not to put too fine a point on it, your Emily is a liar.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，你的艾米丽说谎了。

sentences.en: people who enjoy the finer things in life (= for example art, good food, etc.)
sentences.cn: 享受美好生活的人

sentences.en: She was fined for speeding.
sentences.cn: 她因超速驾车而被罚款 。

sentences.en: She wore a fine chain about her alabaster neck.
sentences.cn: 她细腻光滑、美丽白皙的脖子上戴着一条精致的链子。

sentences.en: She's going to be fine. She always was pretty strong.
sentences.cn: 她会好的。她一直都很强壮。

sentences.en: The dress fitted me fine.
sentences.cn: 这条连衣裙我穿正合身。

sentences.en: The knee's coming on fine, I'm walking comfortably already.
sentences.cn: 膝盖恢复得很好，我现在走路已经不疼了。

sentences.en: The restaurant was chosen for its good food and fine wines .
sentences.cn: 这家餐厅因其美酒佳肴而入选。

sentences.en: The ship has come to rest on the fine sand.
sentences.cn: 这艘船停靠在细沙滩上。

sentences.en: you want to be the Chancellor one fine day.
sentences.cn: 你想有朝一日当上大法官。

words.tran_cn: 应罚款的；可提炼的；可精制的
非常地；细微地；美好地；雅致地
好的；优良的；细小的，精美的；健康的；晴朗的

phrases.tran_cn: 令人称心如意（或心满意足）
适合某人；对某人而言足够
adj. 细纹理，细粒性分布
细密结构；微观组织，微细组织

phrases.phrase: not to put too fine a point on it

phrases.tran_cn: 鼎盛时期；春风得意之时

trans.tran_cn: 美好的，健康的，令人满意的，纤细的，精美的，晴朗的

trans.tran_en: in a way that is satisfactory or acceptable
money that you have to pay as a punishment
to make someone pay money as a punishment
to make someone pay money as a punishment
to make someone pay money as a punishment
